name: Cryo Hypostasis
desc:
Code name: Daleth. A high-purity Cryo entity.
Research suggests that there are subtle differences between elemental hypostases and other elemental life forms in terms of their physical composition. Perhaps these differences can account for their high level of homeostasis and their almost mechanical movements.

value.name: Cryo Hypostasis
value.desc:
Cryo Hypostasis

Code name: Daleth. A high-purity Cryo entity.
It doesn't seem all that good at ball sports...

customize.text: Elemental creatures who protect themselves from incoming attack with their durable shell. Find an opportune moment to land a blow to their <color=#ffe14b>elemental core</color> . At critical moments, they will enter a shielded <color=#ffe14b>regenerative state</color> , firing Frostfruits to attack its foes while restoring its own HP. <color=#ffe14b>Use Charged Attacks to redirect the Frostfruits back at the Cryo Hypostasis</color> to knock it out of its regenerative state swiftly.

<color=#ffd780>"...A Single Night's Work"</color>
Defeat a Cryo Hypostasis that is in a weakened state.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>"Knee-Deep Snow..."</color>
Defeat a Cryo Hypostasis that has revived three times.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Put on Ice</color>
Defeat a Cryo Hypostasis in Co-Op Mode.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Crystalline Bloom
dropMaterial.desc:
An ice crystal of exceeding purity that is created in the frigid blooming of a Cryo Hypostasis.
These frosty crystals will continue to grow according to their own cold, rigid laws, till one day a flower of winter shall bloom and freeze everything. Perhaps it is stagnant time, that never-thawing bosom, that is the essence of this undying flower.

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."
